resources.string: EDGE is the annual techno-management fest of Techno India Salt Lake. The first edition of EDGE was conceived in 2007, and it has been a long and pleasant journey so far. This year, we are celebrating our 10th anniversary. And we dedicate this edition to all the effort and imagination that has been put in by all the individuals who have worked towards making EDGE a grand success.\nEDGE provides a much needed platform to the students that lets them explore and develop their talents, and helps them grow and emerge as winners.Join us in celebrating a decade of imagination.\nJoin us and witness the amalgamation of talent, persistence and an urge to succeed. Join us and witness history in making.

string-array.name: flawless_data
string-array.item: There is a nice saying by a great man that \"A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add but when there is nothing left to take away\". Indeed, a designer is a creator, creator of every single thing which we witness today. Starting from a needle to a spaceship, everywhere designers are required. And they need to be perfect and flawless. If you also think that you are with the calibre, then show that using coding as your sword and achieving victory.

string-array.name: bughunt_data
string-array.item: It\'s not a Bug, it\'s a feature!\"It is always the teeny tiny shingles that end up causing glitches. Experience the thrill of spotting that anomaly which could bring you the ultimate glory. Get your magnifying glasses ready and your Sherlock hats on. It is time to test your capabilities, when one small \';\' could make or mar your code. So gear up to test your coding skills.

string-array.name: cryptoquest_data
string-array.item: 221B, Baker Street. He\u2019s back. And he was looking for this very opportunity to announce his presence. Every fairy tale needs a good old fashioned villain. But with Sherlock not in town, it\u2019s no more a fairy tale. Can you match his intellect and keep the game in balance? Do you have it in you to confront Moriarty? Solve clues, think outside the box and prove yourselves in this game of alertness and concentration.

string-array.name: codemart_data
string-array.item: In an age where entrepreneurship and freelancing rule supreme, it is often not enough to know how to code well but to know how to get others to code for you. CodeMart is a coding event with a twist - the objective is not to solve your own programs but to maximize your objective function. This is a team event, with teams consisting of up to two members. You are welcome to take part by yourself if you so wish. There will only be one, albeit longer than usual, round.

string-array.name: codeout_data
string-array.item: \"If opportunity doesn\'t knock, then build a door.\"\r\nAnd guess what, we have built one for the coders. So all the coders out there who can\'t make it to us, EdgeX feels extremely privileged to present this online coding event. All you have to do is to make your skill sharp enough to hit as hard as needed to be a winner.

string-array.name: gameofzones_data
string-array.item: "Are you a coding geek as well as a gaming freak? Love to dominate and capture territories in games? Well then this is the right place for you. Coding is made even more interesting than ever with a twist. An online Map Conquest event where only the worthwhile would be enthroned as the KING OF THE TERRITORY. So c'mon make your codes mightier than the swords and let your codes clash against each other in this WAR OF DOMINANCE with the slogan \"Code, Conquer, Defend and Win\" !!!"

string-array.name: xoccer_data
string-array.item: \"Invincibility lies in the defense, the possibility of victory in the attack. Show your skills in football with your bot.\"

string-array.name: xport_data
string-array.item: \"The amalgamation of incredible puzzlers with aquatic and terrestrial bots \"

string-array.name: blitzkriegx_data
string-array.item: \"Winze war, pray for peace, may the Robo have mercy on wheels.\"

string-array.name: xult_data
string-array.item: \"You surely don\'t want to be a bystander.\"

string-array.name: aerostrix_data
string-array.item: \"To invent an airplane is nothing\u2026\u2026\u2026\r\nTo build one is something and to fly is everything ! \"

string-array.name: xplore_data
string-array.item: \"At the end it\'s all about taking the right turn\"

string-array.name: perplexity_data
string-array.item: \"Just because my path is complex doesn\'t mean that I\'m lost \"

string-array.name: xtreat_data
string-array.item: \"Victor is the one who makes his own path\"

string-array.name: fifa15_data
string-array.item: FIFA stands for F\u00e9d\u00e9ration Internationale de Football Association. FIFA has a series of association football video games or football simulator, released annually by Electronic Arts under the EA Sports label. Here in EDGE X we will organize FIFA 16 as FIFA Pro league.

string-array.name: fifa11_data
string-array.item: FIFA stands for F\u00e9d\u00e9ration Internationale de Football Association. FIFA has a series of association football video games or football simulator, released annually by Electronic Arts under the EA Sports label. Here in EDGE X we will organize FIFA 11 as FIFA College league.

string-array.name: xquizit_data
string-array.item: \"Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.\"\r\nImplement your knowledge regarding the vast syllabus of Food Technology, Microbiology, Food chemistry etc.

string-array.name: foodrelay_data
string-array.item:
"Individuals don't win ; Teams do."

Have you ever shown your team work? A chance is given to you by EDGE 2016 to show your skills in team game "Food Relay".

string-array.name: creationxnihilo_data
string-array.item: \"Ideas are the roots of creation.\"\r\nEDGE 2016 here offers you an opportunity to prove your skills in creation in the event named Creation-X-Nihilo.

string-array.name: cryptolabel_data
string-array.item: Are you a foodie? Ever looked those tiny little labels in the packages? Implement your knowledge of food product labels in this event.

string-array.name: casestudy_data
string-array.item: \"If you can\'t explain it simply, you don\'t understand it well enough.\"\r\nEDGE 2016 wants to give you a chance to test your decision making skills in the event named Wizcase. All of the relevant information will be provided, use your brains in a perfect manner and impress the judges.\r\n

string-array.name: kwiznet_data
string-array.item: A quiz will be provided to you in which you need not come to the venue. Just you can login into the quiz with the help of an internet connection at any time. Now,enjoy the game.

string-array.name: crumbs_data
string-array.item: \u201cA camera is a save button for the mind\u2019s eye.\u201d\r\nPerspectives are what chisel our persona. Introspect to showcase those scattered crumbs which are termed insignificant by this industrialized urban society.\r\n

string-array.name: odyssey_data
string-array.item:
“You shouldn’t dream your film, you should make it.” 
 ~Steven Spielberg
So go on friends. Embark upon a journey… Capture the mobility.

string-array.name: shootmup_data
string-array.item:
“Photography is an art of observation. It has little to do with the things you see and everything to do with the way you see them.” – Elliott Erwitt.

*This is an open end event. Anyone from any field with any type of camera can participate. Your photos can be used with proper copyright statements for Geekonix beneficial.

string-array.name: insta_data
string-array.item: This is a live photography competition. A tough challenge for all fellow photographers! Come and win cash prizes just by clicking that best shot of yours. \r\n**This is an open end event. Anyone from any field with any type of camera can participate. Your photos can be used with proper copyright statements for Geekonix beneficial.\r\n

string-array.name: thequiz_data
string-array.item: The thing which I enjoy most about the quiz bowl is that it is both a team and an individual competition. Even though you compete as a team, a whole game can change based on the random knowledge of one person.

string-array.name: youthparliament_data
string-array.item: \"Voice the Noise\"\r\n It is a two days spearheading initiative which replicates the Indian parliament, its working and proceedings through Debate, Party Formation, Policy Making and Voting. We strive to bring together as many young, enthusiastic, politically active students from all across India to this one platform where they will exercise their political knowledge and grow as leaders. During these two days, students will engage themselves in political dialogues and deliberations on issues that the country is up against, with few of India\'s most prominent speakers leading to introspection on India\'s democracy.

string-array.name: projectview_data
string-array.item:
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower. It is not just about ideas... 

in fact, one could argue that it is more concerned with implementation, development, 

breakthrough, and that creation might just actually make the engineer an innovator; 

yet the principle of 'implementing' the thought, idea or solution to a problem defines 

the intrinsic character of an engineer.

 Steve Jobs was probably the greatest innovator of modern times. Yet as history 

knows, he would have been nothing without the backing of Steve Wozniak - the 

silent Steve of Apple... the man who redesigned Atari's game box using only 50 ICs 

instead of the 100 it was built with. The idea of Winklevoss brothers' was not worth a 

dime, till Mark Zuckerberg made Facebook!

string-array.name: ragstoriches_data
string-array.item:
With sand and water, the world he stitches
Grant us power, grant our wishes
Gives you scrap to build your creations
Start with rags and ends with riches.

string-array.name: mekanix_data
string-array.item: \u201cGive me a lever long enough and much space to stand and I will move the whole world\u201d.

string-array.name: khuljasimsim_data
string-array.item: Riches do not consist in the possession of treasures, but in the use made of them. Get ready to indulge your grey cells. When the climax unfolds an actual hidden treasure may not be found, but the victory may be equivalent to one.

string-array.name: nirmaan_data
string-array.item: The art of constructing Bridge . Bring out the Engineer inside you. May the BRIDGE you build today, light the way for a better tomorrow.
